member.name: T:CoinspotAPI.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CoinspotAPI.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CoinspotAPI.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:CoinspotAPI.CoinspotAPIHandler.SignData(System.Byte[])
member.param: byte array of full JSON parameter list including nonce
member.returns: HMAC SHA512 encoded string of JSONData
